metadata.dc:author: López-Cortijo, C
Trinidad, A
Martínez, G
Ramón y Cajal, S
Arellano, B
González, F M
metadata.dc:description: Teratomas are germ-cell tumors that usually originate in the gonads. Extragonadal teratomas are rarely found in the neck, particularly in adults. A case of cervical teratoma that presented as a rapidly growing mass in a young man is described. The diagnostic problems are commented.
metadata.dc:title: Teratoma cervical en un adulto.
[Cervical teratoma in an adult].
